snippet: Missy Franklin, who holds the world record in the 200-meter backstroke, has passed up about $150,000 in prize money and more in endorsements to swim for her Colorado high school.
abstract: Profile of American swimmer Missy Franklin, 16-year-old Olympic hopeful for the 2012 London Games; Franklin, who holds the world record in the 200-meter backstroke, has passed up about $150,000 in prize money and more in endorsements to continue to swim for her Colorado high school team.
lead_paragraph: Missy Franklin, who holds the world record in the 200-meter backstroke, has passed up about $150,000 in prize money and more in endorsements to swim for her Colorado high school.

headline.seo: Olympic Hopeful Missy Franklin Loves Competing for Her High School Team
headline.main: Before the Olympic Trials, There’s This Big High School Meet
